constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 98 (Wednesday, June 8, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MOONEY:
H.R. 7984.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 4, Clause 1
``The Times, Places and Manner of holding Elections for
Senators and Representatives, shall be prescribed in each
State by the Legislature thereof; but the Congress may at any
time by Law make or alter such Regulations, except as to the
Places of chusing Senators.''
[Page H5409]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: To nullify Executive Order 14019 relating to promoting voter access.
